ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَأْكُلُونَ أَمْوَٰلَ ٱلْيَتَٰمَىٰ ظُلْمًا إِنَّمَا يَأْكُلُونَ فِى بُطُونِهِمْ نَارًا وَسَيَصْلَوْنَ سَعِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: People who consume the property of orphans wrongfully consume nothing in their bellies except fire. They will roast in a Searing Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who devour the possessions of the orphans unjustly devour only fire, and will surely burn in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Behold, those who wrongfully devour the properties of orphans only fill their bellies with fire. Soon they will burn in the Blazing Flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who wrongfully consume the property of orphans are, in fact, consuming fire in their bellies and they will suffer the blazing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed those who unjustly devour the wealth of orphans only fill their bellies with fire; and soon they will go into a blazing pit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who unjustly eat up the property of orphans, they eat up only a fire into their bellies, and they will be burnt in the blazing Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (As for) those who swallow the property of the orphans unjustly, surely they only swallow fire into their bellies and they shall enter burning fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those who devour the property of orphans unjustly, devour Fire in their bellies, and shall assuredly roast in a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Those who devour the wealth of orphans wrongfully, they do but swallow fire into their bellies, and they will be exposed to burning flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who consume the property of orphans unjustly are actually swallowing fire into their own bellies; soon they will burn in the blazing Flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those who devour the substance of the orphans wrongously, only devour the fire into their bellies, and anon they shall roast in the Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed those who consume the property of orphans wrongfully, only ingest fire into their bellies, and soon they will enter the Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who unjustly eat up the property of orphans, eat up a Fire into their own bodies: They will soon be enduring a Blazing Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, those who unjustly eat up the property of orphans, they eat up only a fire into their bellies, and they will be burnt in the blazing Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who consume the wealth of orphans wrongfully, only consume fire in their bellies, and they shall roast in the Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who consume the wealth of orphans illicitly consume only fire into their bellies; and they will roast in a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, those who devour the property of orphans unjustly are only consuming into their bellies fire. And they will be burned in a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:10] Those who consume the property of orphans unjustly, without any right, are only consuming, the whole of it as, fire in their bellies, because that is where such [action] leads, and they shall be exposed to (read active yaslawna, or passive yuslawna), that is, they shall enter, a blaze, an intense fire, in which they shall burn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Those who devour the wealth of orphans wrongfully) extortionately, (they do but swallow fire into their bellies) i.e. that which is unlawful; it is also said that this means: Allah will place fire in their bellies on the Day of Judgement (and they will be exposed to burning flame) a blazing fire in the Hereafter. This verse was revealed about Hanzalah Ibn Shamardal.
